mutants.code:
def rearrange_array_wave_form(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, arr) = case
        arr.sort()
        i = 2
        while i < N:
            (arr[i - 1], arr[i]) = (arr[i], arr[i - 1])
            i += 2
        results.append(arr)
    return results

    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
